announcements.title: NoVA Telugu Family Fest 2026 Update 1
announcements.body: Early check-in starts at 7:30 AM near the main registration gate.

announcements.title: NoVA Telugu Family Fest 2026 Update 2
announcements.body: Food Street token counters open 30 minutes before the first session.

announcements.title: NoVA Telugu Family Fest 2026 Update 3
announcements.body: Youth hackathon teams must submit final builds by 5:00 PM on Day 2.

announcements.title: NoVA Telugu Family Fest 2026 Update 4
announcements.body: Cultural night seat allocation starts at 6:00 PM in the main auditorium.

announcements.title: NoVA Telugu Family Fest 2026 Update 5
announcements.body: Startup expo mentor office hours are now live on the event board.

announcements.title: NoVA Telugu Family Fest 2026 Update 6
announcements.body: Devotional seva drive buses depart from the north entrance at 7:45 AM.

announcements.title: NoVA Telugu Family Fest 2026 Update 7
announcements.body: Women in Tech networking breakfast moved to Hall C due to demand.

announcements.title: NoVA Telugu Family Fest 2026 Update 8
announcements.body: Health screening slots are filling fast; pre-book at info desk.

announcements.title: NoVA Telugu Family Fest 2026 Update 9
announcements.body: Parking Lot B is full; use overflow parking in Lot D.

announcements.title: NoVA Telugu Family Fest 2026 Update 10
announcements.body: Closing plenary starts 15 minutes earlier than originally planned.

announcements.title: NoVA Telugu Family Fest 2026 Update 11
announcements.body: Volunteer T-shirt pickup remains open until 9:00 PM tonight.

announcements.title: NoVA Telugu Family Fest 2026 Update 12
announcements.body: Matrimony meet-and-greet lounge opens after lunch in Hall F.
